entry.title: Self-introduction
entry.content:
我是一名来自中国的大学学生，目前正在学习计算机，兴趣是软件安全。这是我的第一篇博客，我将尝试编写双语内容，希望你会喜欢。

I’m a university student from China, currently studying computer science with an interest in software security. This is my first blog post, and I’ll try writing bilingual content. Hope you’ll enjoy it.
